alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 11:57AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Santa Cruz, northwestern San Benito, southeastern Santa Clara and northwestern Monterey Counties through 1230 PM PST... At 1157 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Interlaken to 13 miles west of Del Monte Forest. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salinas, Hollister, Seaside, Monterey, Marina, Pacific Grove, Carmel-By-The-Sea, Castroville, Moss Landing, Prunedale, Del Monte Forest, Boronda, San Juan Bautista, Del Rey Oaks, Sand City, Aromas, Elkhorn and Las Lomas. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 74 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
